channel.description: Check here for tips and information related to the Groton Trails Network. Have something to share? Send your thoughts along to gtc@grotontrails.org.

item.title: Ice storm cleanup
item.description:
A hearty group of 8 trail enthusiasts met at Williams Barn to commence work on cleaning up the trails from last weekâ€™s ice storm. The foot of snow from last evening made work difficult but offered a tranquil setting.

It will take months to clean up all the trails so if you go for a hike please pick up debris and toss it to the side of the trail.
